title: r/Insaneparents You Won't Believe What She Says To Her Own Daughter
description:
r/Insaneparents It's another episode of insane parents, where the most absolutely nutso parents treat their kids like they're less than human. The weirdest one comes from a daughter who informs her mom that the family pet has passed away, and for some bizarre reason the mother starts immediately accusing the daughter of killing the dog. What on earth is wrong with these people? If you like this podcast and want to see more, subscribe to my channel for more daily Reddit content!
